attributes.action: Declare Her Majesty, Queen Elizabeth II as a 'Great.'
attributes.additional_details: Due to the long and great years of service, and her committment to the country and commonwealth, numerous charities, along with being a true inspiration and role model to look up to for all.
attributes.background: To review and appoint Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II, as a 'Great'. With official declarations and titles from hereon.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that relate to honours and appointments, which includes calling for a monarch to be given a particular title.
